resources.string: YHWH app

"Everything you've ever wanted is sitting on the other side of fear"
\n\n - George Addair

"The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me"
\n\n - Ayn Rand

"Every strike brings me closer to the next home run"
\n\n - Babe Ruth

"I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work"
\n\n - Thomas A. Edison

"Don’t worry about failure; you only have to be right once"
\n\n - Drew Houston

"You carry the passport to your own happiness"
\n\n - Diane von Furstenberg

"We can see through others only when we can see through ourselves."
\n\n - Bruce Lee

"The battles that count aren't the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself—the invisible, inevitable battles inside all of us—that's where it's at"
\n\n - Jesse Owens

"Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will"
\n\n - Mahatma Gandhi

"The best way to predict the future is to create it"
\n\n - Abraham Lincoln

"I don’t count my sit-ups. I only start counting when it starts hurting because they’re the only ones that count"
\n\n -Muhammad Ali

"When you hit failure, your workout has just begun"
\n\n -Ronnie Coleman
